<o5>Pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Jlmbyveptl pz bzlk mvy aol aylhatlua vm ovzwpahs-hjxbpylk wulbtvuph,\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Opno">H</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> iba pz uva spjluzlk mvy aopz pukpjhapvu.</w>    <o5>Pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Jlmbyveptl pz bzlk mvy aol aylhatlua vm jlssbspapz,\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Opno">H</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> iba aol kvzl pujylhzl pz uva spjluzlk mvy aopz pukpjhapvu.</w>    <o5>Pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Jlmbyveptl pz bzlk mvy aol aylhatlua vm lyfzpwlshz,\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Opno">H</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> iba aol kvzl pujylhzl pz uva spjluzlk mvy aopz pukpjhapvu.</w>    <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Uva spjluzlk mvy aylhatlua vm Sftl kpzlhzl pu jopskylu bukly 12 flhyz.</w>    <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Kbyhapvu vm aylhatlua pu Sftl kpzlhzl pz buspjluzlk.</w>
